SEARCH

Class Asset

java.lang.Object
Asset
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Crypto, Gold, RealState, Stocks
public abstract class Asset extends Object implements Serializable
An abstract base class representing a financial asset with common properties and behaviors. Implements Serializable to support object serialization.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Asset

      public Asset(String Name, int Quantity, Date PurchaseDate, float PurchasePrice, Boolean ZakatApplicable)
      Constructs a new Asset with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      Name - The name of the asset
      Quantity - The quantity of the asset
      PurchaseDate - The date when the asset was purchased
      PurchasePrice - The purchase price of the asset
      ZakatApplicable - Whether the asset is eligible for Zakat calculation

  • Method Details

    • editAsset

      public final void editAsset()
      Allows editing of common asset properties through user input. Uses a Scanner for input and calls the abstract editSpecificDetails method for asset-specific editing.

    • editSpecificDetails

      protected abstract void editSpecificDetails(Scanner scanner)
      Abstract method to be implemented by derived classes for editing asset-specific details.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object to use for user input

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the asset.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string containing the asset's details

      public Boolean isZakatApplicable()
      Checks if the asset is Zakat applicable.
      Returns:
      true if Zakat applies, false otherwise
